mods.abstract: Runaway in Jail. A negro boy, who calls himself William and says he belongs to B. S. Gay, a resident of Bayou Boeuf, was lodged in the Parish Jail, at Opelousas, on FRIDAY, 4th inst. He is 5 feet 4 inches high and about 30 years old. Color black. Speaks English and understands French. The owner is requested to come forward, prove property and take him away, or he will be dealt with according to law. RENE RAULIN, Jailor. Opelousas, Oct. 5 1861.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
